text: Bruno Mattiussi (26 August 1926 â€“ 23 June 1981) was a Luxembourgian boxer. He competed in the men's light middleweight event at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Dudelange. Mattiussi died on 23 June 1981 in Esch-sur-Alzette at the age of 54.Bruno Mattiussi == References == Category:1926 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Luxembourgian boxers Category:Olympians for Luxembourg
